Name: Team Size Limit
Description: Team must not exceed maximum recommended size

Name: Sprint Length Bound
Description: Sprint duration must be between 7 and 30 days

Name: Budget Cap
Description: Total project spending must not exceed Budget

Name: Skill Coverage
Description: All assigned Features must have at least one Employee with required Skill

Name: Availability Constraint
Description: Employee assignment cannot exceed their Availability hours

Name: Release Date Deadline
Description: Release Plans must have Planned Date before roadmap milestone

Name: Blocked Task Limit
Description: Number of simultaneously blocked Tasks â‰¤ 5 per sprint

Name: Workâ€“Life Balance
Description: Daily Scrum duration must not exceed 15 minutes

Name: Backlog Size Bound
Description: Product Backlog entries must not exceed 100 items

Name: Review Attendance
Description: At least 80% Stakeholders must attend each Sprint Review
